topic.title: Introduction to TokenScript
topic.shortdesc: TokenScript is an interoperability layer to make tokens work on various websites and wallets.

body.p: For a token issuer, lets you package the essential HTML/JavaScript needed to access their token contract and let it run in user's wallet as mini dapp, or with other websites that uses your token.
For a website owner, TokenScript lets you use tokens on your website easily.
